thread.title: Goodbye Team Switzerland, Hello ‘Team Noro’

author: Joshua Robinson
title: Goodbye Team Switzerland, Hello ‘Team Noro’
text:
BONGPYEONG, South Korea—The Swiss Freestyle Skiing team, best known for its viral video antics, wasn’t going to let a little norovirus kill the mood here. When two of its members contracted the ailment, also known as the winter vomiting bug, the squad came up with a plan.
“We turned norovirus into a bit of fun inside the team,” manager Christoph Perreten said.
Far...
